channel.title: Script making for games, not runescape
channel.description:
Well, the only program i know of to make scripts for games on the internet is Scar. It is a great program but it is just too slow for my needs and isn't advanced enough.
Also I've heard of things written in Java which are must faster, but i haven't heard of a program that i can make a script in like that or a way to do it.
My question - is there a good program out there that I can write scripts for games in on the internet other than Scar? If you have heard of Ibot/Nexus, then i love how that is set up for making scripts but it only works for RuneScape and i don't want to make scripts for RuneScape.
Anyone know of other methods to make scripts for games or other programs that i can make scripts in?

item.title: Script making for games, not runescape
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

all you have to do is find a compiler, and read lots of wikipedia articles

Read full topic

@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

I’m wondering if there is a program that i can make scripts in for other games on the internet other than runescape. Scar is pretty good but it is too slow.

EDIT: i edited the title because obviously none of you read the first post AT ALL. I clearly said in it that i would make the scripts and I didn’t want it for RuneScape.

item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

[quote=“rabcarl, post:3, topic:135473”]I think what he meant by “script making program” is any sort of autoer.

Nexus and iBot I’ve tried, I’m not really to thrilled about them, take it from me, the free version is shit. And I don’t want to have to pay for the use of a decent bot. Ares was good, until ruler got his Jew hands on it and started charging money.[/quote]ollie decided to make it pay you jew
